Chapter Next

class gstEdge

Mesh element representing an edge of one or more polygonal faces with two gstVertex elements at it's end points (v1 and v2).

From header file: gstEdge.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstEdge
~gstEdge
Functions
getLineSegment Returns a gstLineSegment with p1 and p2 of the line segment coincident to v1 and v2 of this edge.
getNumIncidentPolys Returns number of polygons sharing this edge.
getP1 Returns the first incident poly to this edge from an unordered list.
getP2 Returns the second incident poly to this edge from an unordered list.
getV1 Returns a pointer to gstVertex v1.
getV2 Returns a pointer to gstVertex v2.
incidentPolysBegin Returns an iterator at the beginning position of a list of the incident polygons to this edge.
incidentPolysEnd Returns an iterator at the ending position of a list of the incident polygons to this edge.
isStranded Returns TRUE if the number of incident polygons is 0.
project Projects pt onto edge and returns projection in projectedPt.
v1 Returns a pointer to gstVertex v1.
v2 Returns a pointer to gstVertex v2.
addIncidentPoly Adds poly to the list of incident polygons for this edge.
removeIncidentPoly Removes polyToRemove from list of incident polys to edge.
Virtual Functions
